summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2540, for the improvement of Harrison Street, from Westlake Avenue North to 5th Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 29455 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
